name: Tower Defense (Vergon Forge)
description:
A tower defense game solo developed by Noccai.

Description

The first game I (Noccai) ever developed and finished, a tower defense creatively named "Tower Defense".

Various enemies travel down a path and you have to stop them using towers or you will lose health! (0 health = death ofc!)

Killing enemies gives you gold that you can use to buy said towers.

Controls

A/S/D - Select between the three tower types

Left Mouse Button - Buy and place selected tower

You literally cannot quit the game from inside, so you´ll have to do either Alt + F4 or use Task Manager!
